org.easybatch.extensions.apache.common.csv

Class ApacheCommonCsvRecordMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.extensions.apache.common.csv.ApacheCommonCsvRecordMarshaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordMarshaller<GenericRecord,StringRecord>, RecordProcessor<GenericRecord,StringRecord>

    public class ApacheCommonCsvRecordMarshaller
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordMarshaller<GenericRecord,StringRecord>
    Marshals a POJO to CSV format using Apache Common CSV.
